title: Amazon | SDE2 | Bangalore (India) | 2024
content:
* Education: Graduate
* Years of Experience: 2 years 5 months
* Prior Experience: SWE @FAANG
* Date of the Offer: Dec 2024
* Company: Amazon 
* Title/Level: SDE II 
* Location: Bengaluru, India
* Salary: 46.5L
* Signing Bonus: 18.1L (First Year) + 13.8L (Second Year)
* Relocation Bonus: 1.5L 
* Stock bonus: 220 Stocks (~45K USD, Vesting - 5% on 1st year, 15% on 2nd Year, 20% for every 6 months after that)
* Bonus: N/A
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 66L (First Year)
* Benefits: Standard Amazon Benefits

Interview Experience: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-question/6123796/Amazon-or-SDE2-or-Bangalore-(India)-or-2024-Offer

title: Microsoft | L62 offer |  Hyderabad
content:
Education:  Tier-1 College
Years of experience: 7 yrs (non-FAANG)
Date of offer: 6 Dec 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title: L62 (SDE 2)
Location: Bangalore
Base salary: 42,00,000
Relocation bonus: 6,65,000
Stock bonus: 90K USD over 4 years
Joining bonus: 8L
Performance bonus : 0-20% 
Benefits: Standard Microsoft benefits
Counter offers: None

Current TC: 40 LPA

Is this offer from Microsoft considered low for someone with approximately 7 years of experience? Please advise.

title: Toast | SDE 2 | Bengaluru
content:
Education: BTech in IT from Tier-3
Years of Experience: 3.3
Prior Experience: Payments & Banking
Date of the Offer: Nov 2024
Company: Toast
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Bangaluru, India
Prev Salary: INR 10 lakhs
Base Salary: INR 32 lakhs
Relocation: INR 5 lakhs(On Bills)
Signing Bonus: INR 1 lakhs
Stock bonus: $12.33K stock grant vested over 4 years (vesting schedule: 25:25:25:25)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ INR 35.65 lakhs for first year (32 base + 1 JB + 2.65 stocks).
Benefits: Standard benefits(Good)
Other details: Declined offer.
salaryTotal: : ~ Inr 35.65 Lakhs For First Year (32 Base + 1 Jb + 2.65 Stocks).
